cards.title: The squares
cards.content: A paper with the riddle: how many squares do you see in that picture?

cards.title: An old chest
cards.content: The old chest is closed. What secrets could it be hidden?

cards.title: A rusty key
cards.content: The rusty key must open something in the room...

cards.title: A locked door
cards.content: The door is locked with a code. I must find it to escape.
